principle.name: Verify Before Installing
principle.description: Always check existing installations before adding new plugins or skills to avoid conflicts
principle.rationale: Prevents plugin conflicts and ensures compatibility

example.good: Check existing plugins in opencode.json, verify no conflicts, then add plugin
example.bad: Install plugin without checking existing configuration

principle.name: Configure Authentication First
principle.description: Set up authentication (Google OAuth) before configuring premium models
principle.rationale: Ensures access to premium models and prevents authentication errors

example.good: Run `opencode auth login` first, then configure model usage

principle.name: Enable Autonomous Features Gradually
principle.description: Enable self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving features incrementally
principle.rationale: Allows for testing and validation of each autonomous feature

example.good: Enable self-healing first, test, then enable self-learning, then self-evolution
example.bad: Enable all autonomous features at once without testing

convention.rule: Always use the latest stable version unless beta features are specifically needed
Configure plugins in the correct order: authentication → models → features
convention.template: 1. Set up authentication 2. Configure model definitions 3. Enable plugin features 4. Test functionality

convention.rule: Map skills to appropriate agent categories based on functionality

examples.good: Debugging skills → oracle agent, Frontend skills → frontend-ui-ux-engineer
examples.bad: All skills → sisyphus agent without categorization

convention.rule: Enable skills incrementally and test each before proceeding
convention.template: 1. Install skill from SkillHub 2. Add to oh-my-opencode.json configuration 3. Test basic functionality 4. Enable in autonomous workflows

convention.rule: Configure error detection and recovery mechanisms with appropriate thresholds
Enable knowledge retention and pattern recognition with tracking
Configure behavior adaptation and strategy optimization

pitfall.description: Plugin conflicts due to incompatible versions
pitfall.correct_approach: Check compatibility matrix and use tested combinations
Set up authentication before configuring premium models
Enable features gradually and test each one
